brief_title: A Study of Disease Progression and Anti-HIV Treatments
brief_summary: To determine the influence of virus load, CD4 count, biologic phenotype, and presence of symptomatic disease on the response of HIV-infected patients to a new therapeutic regimen. PER AMENDMENT 8/27/96: To extend the availability of currently assigned ACTG 303 treatment for 6 months.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must have: - Prior participation on protocol ACTG 175. PER AMENDMENT 8/27/96: - Patients must be on study/on treatment at the time the protocol study treatment is extended.
